page_content: The page provides historical information about a directive related to the collection of transfer taxes by the land registry office.
The page discusses regulations and enhancements related to mathematics teaching materials for secondary schools.
The page outlines an inter-cantonal agreement for social institutions, focusing on regulations and cost-sharing mechanisms.
The page discusses the annual report on bicycle promotion for the year 2022, detailing various initiatives and programs.
The page discusses a legal case involving an individual's application for marriage preparation and the refusal to include him in the Swiss civil status register due to fraudulent identification.
The page discusses the implementation of measures to reduce the workload in schools, focusing on administrative processes and teacher evaluations.
The page provides guidelines for emergency preparedness, focusing on essential goods to keep at home in case of power shortages.
